name: Dragon Storm (itch)
description:
Dragons are attacking the village. Hold the space bar to angle your arrows, release to fire them. Kill the dragons before they reach the village and destroy all the huts. Can you survive all 12 waves?

Simple game prototype made in Clickteam Fusion 2.5, loosely based on an old Apple ][ game. Unfortunately haven't had time to improve it since the Game Jam. Enjoy!
